metadata.title: CVE-2017-12871 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The aesEncrypt method in lib/SimpleSAML/Utils/Crypto.php in SimpleSAMLphp1.14.x through 1.14.11 makes it easier for context-dependent attackers tobypass the encryption protection mechanism by leveraging use of the first16 bytes of the secret key as the initialization vector (IV).

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
